reviews.review_msg: Elizabeth Cooper was an awesome professor who made me look at the realities of international development, refugee situations and the global political environment. Her class wasn't easy, but it was one of the greatest classes I've taken.

Professor Armijo is very knowledgeable about international finance and global governance. She is also very supportive of her students. In this particular course, the assignments were often confusing and the expectations unclear. Perhaps more of a focus on policy analysis in the seminars would have been beneficial.

It takes a bit of investigating to figure out what she wants from her assignments, but I always gain a much deeper understanding of topics from them. They're well designed. she's subtlety an excellent prof. boring lectures and annoyingly liberal readings  but allows thoughtful critique, which inspires understanding those ideas & alternatives.
